title: Mette Frederiksen
summary: Mette Frederiksen (Danish: [ˈmetə ˈfʁeðˀʁeksn̩] (listen); born 19 November 1977) is a Danish politician who has been Prime Minister of Denmark since June 2019 and Leader of the Social Democrats since June 2015. The second woman to hold either office, she is also the youngest prime minister in Danish history.[1]
